article_title: Oxnard events aim to help people meet Covered California deadlines
article_text:
FILE PHOTO

With the deadline nearing, Covered California enrollment events will be held Saturday and Sunday in Oxnard. Covered California is the insurance marketplace created by the Affordable Care Act. Its open enrollment period ends Feb. 15. People who opt to go without coverage and don’t meet the exemptions could face tax penalties. At the free enrollment event, questions will be answered. People will be able to begin the application process and receive estimates on premium costs. The events will be held in rooms L-14, L-15 and L-16 at the Oxnard College Plaza, 4000 S. Rose Ave. For questions, call 981-5212 or go to http://www.coveredca.com.
